content.applicationFee: The application fee is £{{ applicationFee.fee_amount }}. The payment can be made by anyone with a valid debit or credit card.
content.noRefund: Only continue if you’re sure that you want to apply. You can’t get a refund after the application has been issued (sent out).
content.claimingCosts: If you're claiming the divorce costs from your {{ divorceWho }}, this fee can be included in any costs order the court makes.
content.save: Save and close this page if you can’t pay the fee now. Your application won’t be processed until you have paid the fee.
